template.name: bs3-alert-link
template.value: .alert.alert-warning(role='alert') strong Warning! | Better check yourself, you're a.alert-link(href='#') not looking too good | . $END$

template.name: bs3-template:html5
template.value: doctype html head title $var2$ meta(charset='UTF-8') meta(name='description', content='') meta(name='viewport', content='width=device-width,initial-scale=1') // Bootstrap CSS link(href='https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.4/css/bootstrap.min.css', rel='stylesheet', media='screen') h1.text-center $var3$ // jQuery script(src='https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.11.1/jquery.min.js') // Bootstrap JavaScript script(src='https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.4/js/bootstrap.min.js') $END$

template.name: bs3-input
template.value: input.form-control(type='$var1$', name='$var2$', id='$var3$', var4='', var5='', var6='') $END$
